import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./Graella.css"; /*function Graella() { return ( <>

GRAELLA

1.Bebé monstruo.
); }*/ let imgUrls = [ "foto1.jpg", "foto2.jpg", "foto3.jpg", "foto4.jpg", "foto5.jpg", "foto6.jpg", "foto7.jpg", "foto8.jpg" ] class Graella extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) // Inicializar los estados this.state = {height:200, width:200} // Bind context of 'this' this.handleZoomIn = this.handleZoomIn.bind(this) this.handleZoomOut = this.handleZoomOut.bind(this) // Crea la referencia al objeto this.imgRef = React.createRef() } componentDidMount(){ // Pone las dimensiones originales de la imagen this.initialHeight = 100 this.initialWidth = 100 } handleZoomIn(){ // Crea los const height = this.imgRef.current.clientHeight const width = this.imgRef.current.clientWidth // Incrementa las dimensiones this.setState({ height : height + 100, width : width + 100, }) } // Event handler callback zoom out handleZoomOut(){ // Assigning original height and width this.setState({ height : this.initialHeight, width : this.initialWidth, }) } render(){ // Assign current height and width to the image const imgStyle = { height : this.state.height, width: this.state.width} return(

Graella de Imagenes

) } } export default Graella
